Name: Kid,napper: Gosh, I'm Kidnapped by a Pupil
About the game: This work is a free short text based Doujin adventure game, produced with passion. Game Features Beautiful CG and illustration Lovely music Dual ending A touching story about internal healing Synopsis In order to help the head of department to organize some materials, I still had to come to the school to work during the holidays. Thereâ€™s none of that cool breeze of the air conditions, nor is there any loli within the school grounds. - Initially, it should just have been a normal, mundane daily stuff. Regrets that had once branded into the memories, the one that was once my obsession. I thought those had already been buried deep within me, chains, locked away. Memoires are just, memories, and they should never resurface again. Yeah, if I had not met that girl in the classroom, I would have continued on to live my life as is, till my death. Character introduction Me 'A new teacher, holds the potential for endless possibility.' - So says one of the staff materials in the education department. Kye The enigmatic loli who was wandering the deserted school grounds during the summer vacation. The feature is loli, basically a loli. Despite trying her best to be the same as others, but the act of trying to be human, as human, is already rather strange. A normal, young girl from afar, but once she starts to talk, there seems to be a something off within her. No matter how hard you look, her existence is a sheer contract to the male protagonist who reeks of danger, she might even be the symbol of peace and beauty.
